Welcome to atom-theme-p-light-syntax


A light atom syntax theme. Derivative of Atom's 
One Light Syntax Theme
. 


For official documentation visit

The 
atom-theme-p-light-syntax

docs.title: Home

docs.text: A light atom syntax theme. Derivative of Atom's  One Light Syntax Theme .   For official documentation visit The  atom-theme-p-light-syntax  web site .
docs.title: Welcome to atom-theme-p-light-syntax

docs.text:
atom-theme-p-light-syntax


atom-theme-p-light-syntax
 is an 
Atom-Editor
 Syntax Theme package a derivative of Atom's 
One
Light Syntax Theme
.


Features






Additional Syntax highlighting for a number of languages:




LCONF
 The light and simple readable data serialization format for dynamic
    configurations and data exchange.








Installation


Installation happens normally either through 
apm install atom-theme-p-light-syntax
 or through the install section of
the settings tab within Atom.


Recommended Extras




The 
atom-language-lconf
 package provides LCONF language support in
    Atom Editor.




The 
atom-language-julia
 package is a Julia language support
    package for the Atom editor.






Atom Light UI Theme
 package is the recommendet companion UI Theme.






Recommended Atom Settings




UI Theme
: 
Atom Light


fontFamily: "Liberation Mono"


lineHeight: 1.3




LCONF Language Example File
